articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook praised 40 students from Tamil Nadu for capturing different shades of the coastal state on iPhone 13 mini.
articles.content: Apple CEO Tim Cook has tweeted about students from Tamil Nadu who recently captured a variety of images ‘shot on iPhone 13 mini’. The photos that highlight different shades of the coastal state and c… [+1793 chars]
